categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars drafts

nodes.text: Ogana Major, or Ogana, was a huge blue planet in the Kessil system. It was orbited by five moons, including the Fourth Moon of Ogana.
It was the homeworld of The Starkiller, and was destroyed by the Galactic Empire before Luke Starkiller could reach it.
It was a desert world, above which Princess Leia was captured by the Empire.
